Description: Written by the abbot of the Orbei Monastery, in a thin hand.
Flavor: Lo, the Great Beast Tathamet was struck down and its blackened husk sank below the abyss. There, it smoldered and festered, and from the ruin of its Seven Heads were born Seven Great Evils. Three Primes and Four Lessers. Enemies of all creation.
Name: The Birth of Hell
